text: Malevolent Shadows
The strong prescense of Ulgu is palpable, it suffocates light and the shadows grow thicker.
Shadow Pendulum
A spectral pendulum swings, razor sharp and with lethal speed, through the foe.
Choaking Shadow Miasma
A confounding fog numbs and deludes enemies, causing them to stumble and stagger.
Vindicitive Necromancy
The Necromancy used to revive the Jiangshi Wight Kings is a volatile magic. It hurts those who try and break this reanimation.
Fog of the Damned
They'll never know how many we are in this fog… Attack!
Missile Mirror
A magical of shifting darkness and howling wind snatches the enemy’s missiles from the air, even as they are fired, and hurls them back at their owners.
Necrotic Breath
A twisted breath of corrupted spirirt energy, so potent it dissolves foes to the bone.
Reanimation Storm
The spirits of the lost flock around this lightning battery, returning unlife to the damned.
Wave of Darkness
A wave of congealed darkness steals the heat from all it hits and feeds on life force itself.
Lesser Doombolt
A bolt of eldritch darkness less complex then those found in Naggaroth.
Necro-Storm Battery
The Dusk Wights & Necromancers of Nonchang have made devilish devices that can corrupt the elemental powers with unholy taint.
Assault of Stone
Many Mages remember a spell from long ago that could move mountains: the Assault of Stone.
Kraken's Pull
Few have the strength to break free once the Kraken has them within its horrid, betentacled grasp.
Breaker of Wills
The Dragons have ruled Cathay for centuries, but no longer, we shall break their will and torment their souls.
Unholy Rebirth
With strange aeons even death may die...
Summon Zombie Longspears
“Do not call up that which you cannot put down.”
Swarm of Hungry Spirits
The eternally damned also experience eternal hunger, once released from their bonds they will ravage anything that breathes.
Malevolent Darkness
“I felt myself on the edge of the world; peering over the rim into a fathomless chaos of eternal night.”
